languages.text: "Всего один хороший солдат из целого конвоя! Печально. Отправляйтесь в казармы, рядовой, и ждите новых приказов".
"Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."
languages.original_text: "Всего один хороший солдат из целого конвоя! Печально. Отправляйтесь в казармы, рядовой, и ждите новых приказов".

traits.locale_text: "Just one good soldier in a whole convoy! Deplorable. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."
"Just one good soldier in a whole convoy! Deplorable. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."
"Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."
"Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."
"Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."
"Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

languages.text: "Nur ein guter Soldat in einem ganzen Konvoi! Erbärmlich. Geht zur Kaserne, Soldat, und erwartet neue Befehle."
languages.original_text: "Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein guter Soldat in einem ganzen Konvoi! Erbärmlich. Geht zur Kaserne, Soldat, und erwartet neue Befehle."

languages.text: « Un seul bon soldat dans tout un convoi ! C'est pitoyable. Rendez-vous à la caserne, soldat, et attendez de nouveaux ordres. »
languages.original_text: "Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

traits.locale_text: « Un seul bon soldat dans tout un convoi ! C'est pitoyable. Rendez-vous à la caserne, soldat, et attendez de nouveaux ordres. »

languages.text: “整支队伍里只有一位出色的士兵！真是可悲。回营地去吧，列兵，等待新的指令。”
languages.original_text: "Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

traits.locale_text: “整支队伍里只有一位出色的士兵！真是可悲。回营地去吧，列兵，等待新的指令。”

languages.text: 「護衛団総出で優秀な兵士がひとりだけとは！情けない。兵舎に戻り命令を待て」
languages.original_text: "Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛団総出で優秀な兵士がひとりだけとは！情けない。兵舎に戻り命令を待て」

languages.text: «¡Un solo buen soldado en todo el convoy! Patético. Diríjase al cuartel, soldado, y espere nuevas órdenes».
languages.original_text: "Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

traits.locale_text: «¡Un solo buen soldado en todo el convoy! Patético. Diríjase al cuartel, soldado, y espere nuevas órdenes».

languages.text: "Koca konvoydan tek bir düzgün asker çıkıyor! Rezillik. Kışlaya dönüp yeni emirlerini bekle asker."
languages.original_text: "Only one good soldier in a whole convoy! Pathetic. Head to the barracks, private, and await new orders."

traits.locale_text: "Koca konvoydan tek bir düzgün asker çıkıyor! Rezillik. Kışlaya dönüp yeni emirlerini bekle asker."
